titles.letter_without_accent: Rules of Scrabble - Letter with an accent
titles.letter_points: Rules of Scrabble - Points of a letter
titles.end_game: Rules of Scrabble - End of game
titles.red_tile: Rules of Scrabble - Pink/Red tiles on the board
titles.blue_tile: Rules of Scrabble - Blue tiles on the board

descriptions.word_placement: You can place a word horizontally from left to right or vertically up to down
descriptions.letter_without_accent: A letter without an accent will be considered like its equivalent with accent if it can allow the formation of a word
descriptions.special_letters: The letter '*' can replace any lette (ex. *curie is equivalent to the 'écurie'
descriptions.letter_points: Plus une lettre est rare, plus elle vaut de points
descriptions.score: Your score is show below your name
descriptions.timer: You have one minute to play !
descriptions.switch_letters: Right click on your rack to select a letter for an exchange
descriptions.placement: You can confirm your placement by clicking on the 'Play' button
descriptions.give_up: You can give up by pressing on the 'Give up' button
descriptions.skip_turn: You can skip your turn by pressing on the 'Skip' button
descriptions.board: Left clicking on the board allow you to see the direction of your placement
descriptions.chat: You can discuss with your opponents when you are in-game
descriptions.search_definition: You can search for the definition(s) of a word by spelling it correctly
descriptions.shake: You can shake your device up and down to remove the letters placed on the board
descriptions.end_game: 1. The game end if the letter bank is empty and a player empty his rack or 2. Every player skip their turn 3 times in a row
descriptions.drag: You can drag and drop the letters from your rack to the board
descriptions.red_tile: If one or more letters were added on a pink or red tile, the total of the word is doubled for each pink tile or tripled for each red tile
descriptions.blue_tile: The value of a letter placed on a light blue tile is doubled. The value of a letter placed on a dark blue tile is tripled

end_game.title: The game is over
end_game.winners: Congratulations to the following player(s) for winning the game :

joker.title: Insert the desired letter
joker.info: This modal is available by clicking on a tile
joker.label: Wildcard letter
joker.error: You must only type a letter used in french (ex : à)

shop.empty_cart_msg: Your shopping cart is empty at the moment
